description: Make your own basil oil to use as a pasta salad dressing in this recipe loaded with antipasto. It's a colourful dish to bring to a barbecue or picnic.
name: Bean & Lentil Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pasta, beans, prosciutto, capsicum, bocconcini and half the basil oil in a serving bowl. Toss gently to combine. Scatter over reserved basil, drizzle over vinegar, and serve with remaining basil oil and bread.
